name: Luniere
description:
WARNING: May contain loud sound(s).

Luniere wants to go back home, but the door is locked, and the keys are missing! Help her gather the keys and make it back home safe and sound! But beware; who knows what may lurk in the dark at night?

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Spacebar / Left Mouse Button - Interact

Luniere is a short, horror-themed adventure game with a paper aesthetic. Made for Scream Jam 2020.
